info.title: Fault Interrupter Switch

switch.fault.description: This Resource describes a fault interrupter switch (on/off/faulted). The Property "state" is an enum. A state of "on" means that the switch is on. A state of "off" means that the switch is off. A state of "faulted" means the switch is faulted, in such a state an UPDATE is not possible.
